name: Behind The Mirror
description:
"They say that the personality, the past, the pain of an individual is enclosed in his name.

Should you forget your name, should you look for it or create a new one? "

WARNING: The following game contains what you consider grotesque imagery,violence,grisly imagery,language,ear rape. Young children and those who have problems with these things should refrain from downloading this game.

(Possible Epylepsy Warning)

(Thanks to YouFulca for a couple of BGM I used,Aurora Guglielmucci for the cover image and for the voice acting)
